row.entry: This module transfers color characteristics from one image to another. In its current version this module has several issues and is not recommended for use – a rework is under way.

sect5.title: number of clusters
sect5.para: Set the number of color clusters to use.

sect5.title: acquire
sect5.para: Press this button to acquire colors from the source image.

sect5.title: apply
sect5.para: Press this button to impose the colors to the destination image.
